game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the artifact and return it to the village elder
game.description: You need to find the artifact which was lost during the last orc attack on our village. You have to go through the orc territory and a series of puzzles in the hidden temple where the artifact is believed to be hidden.

task.description: You need to sneak through the orc territory without being noticed.
Once in the temple, you need to solve a series of puzzles to uncover the artifact
Bring the artifact back to the village elder to complete your quest.
